## MessageHandler type

Message handler function type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type MessageHandler<State, Components extends Record<string, unknown>, M extends Msg> = (ctx: MessageContext<State, Components, M>) => void;
```
**References:** [Msg](./tea.msg.md)<!-- -->, [MessageContext](./dsl.messagecontext.md)

## Remarks

Message handlers are registered via `AppBuilder.onMessage()` and are called when a message of the specified type is received.
